title: Love and Rockets
description:
The only band that came after Bauhaus involving the former Bauhaus members who ever got a us top 5 song was Love And Rockets. Their hit single So Alive reached number 3  1989 despite being only the second single from the album. Although it consisted of 3 out of 4 members of Bauhaus the sound of LaR are nothing even close to Gothic music spanning from electric music passing by some AOR sound to the T-Rex inspired So Alive. The band formed 1985 finally gave up 1998 when plans to ressurect Bauhaus where made. 

Here are all 7 studio records they made but unfortunately no bonuses this time.

Seventh Dream of Teenage Heaven
Express
Earth, Sun, Moon
Love and Rockets
Hot Trip to Heaven
Sweet F.A.
Lift
